price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ̀yin onítírà, ẹ má ṣe tayọ ẹnu-ààlà nínú ẹ̀sìn yín, (ẹ má sọ ohun tí) kì í ṣe òdodo. Ẹ má sì ṣe tẹ̀lé ìfẹ́-inú ìjọ kan tó ti ṣìnà ṣíwájú (ìyẹn, àwọn yẹhudi). Wọ́n ṣi ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ lọ́nà. Wọ́n sì ṣìnà kúrò ní ojú ọ̀nà tààrà.”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا تَغۡلُواْ فِي دِينِكُمۡ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَ قَوۡمٖ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ مِن قَبۡلُ وَأَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗا وَضَلُّواْ عَن سَوَآءِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lā taghlū fī dīnikum ghayra al-ḥaqi walā tattabiʿū ahwāa qawmin qad ḍallū min qablu wa-aḍallū kathīran waḍallū ʿan sawāi al-sabīli
